features: [Unscented] -Made with aloe, vitamin E and saline to provide an pH-balanced ultimate soft and gentle clean to baby's nose and face.
[No Harsh Ingredients]-Free of alcohol, perfume, parabens, phenoxyethanol, dyes, lotions, sulphates, MIT

[Resealable and Small Size Pack]- Resealable packs keep wipes moist, provide a refreshing clean for your little one anytime anywhere. The small packs are perfect for traveling or staying in your diaper bag.
[Versatile Use Baby Wipes]-Our wet baby wipes have multi-purpose. The wide range usages from diaper changes, cleanse after mealtime, hands and face to toy cleaning.
[Specification of baby wipes]- 7.4 * 7.2 inch (18.8*18.3 cm). Contains 6 flip-top packs of 30 unscented baby wipes (180 wipes total)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast, soft, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I was not a big believer of ready made face wipes, but that changed as soon as we had our son! These will always be on hand for us, on every counter and in every bag. Not just for runny noses, but great for overall clean ups as well after eating, wiping hands. 100% recommend! It comes with a ton and they're always full of moisture!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for what I needed
reviews.reviewText: So I actually used these for my hairless cat when he got an upper respiratory infection and we needed to clean his nose and eyes. These worked perfectly, cleaned well and with out any kind of irritation. I even use them for myself now to freshen my face after being outside in the Arizona heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cheaper than “boogie wipes” but just as good. Thick wipes that dont dry out , and soft on kids faces/noses. Mom win forsure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for littles
reviews.reviewText: I recommend these to all my soon to be moms. All kids have boogers at one point and these are great. It’s small so it can be thrown into a diaper bag or purse and it’s easy to open and pull out one wipe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Boogie Wipes
reviews.reviewText: Better than Boogie Wipes in my opinion. I use them on my two year old’s dried sleep around his eyes, his nose and have even used them as a regular wipe in a pinch at the park. He has very sensitive skin and these have never bothered him. TMI in a normal conversation but for this product review it feels necessary to note that it takes hard/crusty boogers off very easily. Price is waaay better than boogie wipes and since they are so cheap I use them much more often than I did Boogie Wipes. Daily staple, keep packs in car, diaper bag and at home. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and soft...
reviews.reviewText: My babies nose, face and hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than boogie wipes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice wipes at a great price
reviews.reviewText: The boogie wipes brand are completely out of stock for awhile. We’ve tried frida baby and that is awfully. I’ve looked around. There’s not much reviews on this one but quite positive so I decided to give this a try. I have no issues unfolding it…just take one out and kinda swing downward and ta-da;) Quality is good. Everything seems to be good so far. Most importantly it’s unscented!!!There’s a lightning deal + 20% off coupon going on so I reorder more. Great deal but otherwise price wise it is still lower than other brands. I would recommend if you too are shopping around for nose wipes.
